_xResult.title: A Delicate Thing Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made maxi dress with flower fabric embellishment
_xResult.longdesc:
You may not expect to find a maxi dress on the beach, but we think it is the perfect backdrop for this custom made cotton-blend dress. The wrapped nature adds shape to the flowing dress. We love the v-neck, mature bell sleeves and flower that is placed at the waist for a delicate detail. This dress will wow at any event, party or vacation you decide to wear it to.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
